text: Far Cry 5 is a 2018 first-person action-adventure shooter game, made by Ubisoft Montreal and Ubisoft Toronto and published by Ubisoft. It is the successor to 2014's Far Cry 4, and the fifth main game in the Far Cry series. == References == Category:2018 video games Category:Far Cry Category:Ubisoft games Category:First-person shooters Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about drugs Category:Video games about police officers Category:Vietnam War video games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: Far Cry 5
